title: New: Gucci Mane – Stupid (Lapalux Bootleg)
body:
And so we come to the end of 2012, time for some established artists to sit back and think about their successes.

In **Lapalux**’s case however, the end of 2012 inspired him to put together this thoroughly unexpected remix of the **Gucci Mane** track, Stupid. It sounds exactly as bizarre as it does in your head, only better.
